thread.title: Endpoint Protector 4 wins Computing Security DLP Solution of the Year Award for the 2nd Year in a row
thread.title_full: Endpoint Protector 4 wins Computing Security DLP Solution of the Year Award for the 2nd Year in a row | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Endpoint Protector 4 wins Computing Security DLP Solution of the Year Award for the 2nd Year in a row
text:
(MENAFN Press) CoSoSys is proud to announce that Endpoint Protector 4 its flagship software for Data Loss Prevention and Mobile Device Management has won the Computing Securityâ€™s DLP Solution of the Year award for the 2nd year consecutively. Endpoint Protector 4 prevents data loss and data theft for companies in more than 100 countries. The solution stands out through powerful content filters and user-friendly management console as well as easy implementation and low TCO. The audit capabilities give a detailed view of data security incidents and it offers organizations the information to give the data transfer authorization only to trusted people and on trusted applications and devices. 
Endpoint Protector DLP is available as Virtual and Hardware Appliance and is compatible with Windows and Mac OS X including the latest Mac OS X El Capitan. The software provides also Data Loss Prevention and Device Control capabilities for Linux. It is complemented by a Mobile Device Management module for businesses that want to support the BYOD trend and secure data on Apple iOS and Android mobile devices with this covering the entire workstations fleet. 
''We are thrilled to receive this award for the second year in a row and we are thankful to everyone that voted for us naming us the best DLP Solution in 2015. Computing Security Awards UK is one of the most important IT Security awards program and it is an honor to be among the winners. We are certain that with our strong and innovative roadmap we are a tough to beat contender also for 2016'' said Roman Foeckl CoSoSys CEO. 
The annual Computing Security Awards UK was set up to recognize the solutions and the solution-providers that have been particularly impressive in the fight against security threats. Now in their sixth year these awards are well known and well respected by end users and by the vendors' community. For more information about the awards and the full list of winners please visit: http://www.computingsecurityawards.co.uk/ 
Endpoint Protector 4 from CoSoSys is represented by emt Distribution as its authorized distributors for the Middle East region. CoSoSys is currently presenting its award winning DLP solution Endpoint Protector at GITEX Technology Week at emt Distribution booth that is located at Stand No. B2-6 Hall 2 Dubai World Trade Centre Dubai UAE
